response.overview: Hot new assistant Will joins the Eurocreme team, helping out director Simon Booth. Asked to film on set, it's clear to see that the model interviews and live action stir some deep urge for exhibitionism in the stunning young stud. We follow his interviews; featuring all of Eurocreme's hottest stars as he tells us he's getting more and more convinced he wants to play a bigger part in the production. The behind the scenes shots add a new dimension to the flagship DreamBoy range, blurring the line between fantasy and reality.  Watching the 11" Fuck Stud Matt Hughes satisfying his twink, will can only dream of being infront of the camera. His desires only increase as he watches stars Shane Stone, Philippe Delvaux and Alex Stevens work their magic on set. Dark hair and stunning blue eyes, the sexy Will looks perfect for the job- but does he have what it takes to become a Euro Cream star?
response.title: Porn Boy
